title: Bilgewater event not progressing
body: It has taken me about 10 ARAM games to build up the 25k gold, because so far it has only counted 3 games, and watching it sit at 24.9k for 5 or 6 games was the WORST. Also, I noticed only one of my ARAM games is showing up in my match history, not sure if this is connected. All of those were matchmade, solo ARAMs. Not especially looking forward too see how long it will take to register 50 assists now, since act 1 should be done at this point.

replies.body: And of course just after I post this, everything catches up and suddenly I go from just finishing the first objective, to suddenly having an icon. Well, either it caught up, or rito is watching these and chucking rewards at the people having issues. Either way, I'm {{item:3931}}.

Hiya! 

There may be a slight delay with reward progress.  Glad to see everything caught up. :]
By a slight delay, do you mean 4+ hours? O_o

I logged out of the client and logged back in again, and was asked to re-select a champion to follow. Even after doing so and playing a match-made ARAM game (and winning), I still have not seen any progress when using the "Click here to earn Bilgewater rewards" link in the LoL client. Really hope my progress doesn't just get reset again after I re-log...
